articles.title: Hyderabad Set To Emerge As Global Hub For Coronavirus Vaccine In 2021 - NDTV
articles.description: As the world is set to brace for a new year amid the COVID-19 pandemic, the city is poised to emerge as a ''saviour'' from the killer virus, with as many as five vaccine manufacturing firms based racing to bring out an antidote.
articles.content:
Some of these companies have also drawn up plans to scale up their vaccine manufacturing capacities.
